availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Garrard County, Kentucky, farmer. Virginia native. Married to Mary "Polly" Gully Ward in Garrard County on April 2, 1825. Father of Malinda Ward, Amanda Ward, Drury Ward, and Ellen Ward. Farmer in Garrard County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Garrard County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Garrard County, Division 1, p. 214B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Garrard County, p. 714.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Garrard County, Buckeye, p 391A.
Kentucky Death Certificates, 1911-1965, Kentucky Office of Vital Statistics, KDLA, Frankfort, KY, File #20731.
